author: Zughy
long_description:
# country_lib

country_lib is a small util library providing country localised names and flags. It uses [alpha-2 codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) from the ISO 3166-1 international standard (basically, the same used by website domains, e.g. ".it", ".de"). 

### How to

Check the [DOCS](https://gitlab.com/zughy-friends-minetest/country_lib/-/blob/main/DOCS.md) to learn how to use it
name: country_lib
short_description: small util library providing country localised names and flags
title: country_lib
